synopsis.text:
Sunday, October premieres the first-ever chibi-character crossover anime series, Kaginado, featuring beloved characters from Key's popular visual novel and anime franchises, including Kanon, Air, Clannad, Little Busters!, Rewrite, and more surprise additions to be revealed. In this extraordinary school year, fan-favorite characters from different worlds and timelines find themselves attending the miraculous Kaginado Academy, where dreams and hopes intertwine in a lively, unpredictable atmosphere.

Ryou Fujibayashi, sensitive to others' opinions and occasionally envious, navigates her school life alongside Yukito Kunisaki, who grapples with feelings of not belonging and joblessness. Meanwhile, the accident-prone Ayu Tsukimiya stumbles through her days, both literally and metaphorically. With their distinct personalities and quirks, these students, among many others, bring laughter, chaos, and heartwarming moments to their newfound universe.

Prepare for an unforgettable adventure filled with dreamlike encounters, fourth-wall-breaking humor, and the radiant promise of new beginnings at Kaginado Academy. Don't miss out on this delightful journey that awaits beyond the stars!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
